channel.title: Uhm
channel.description: How do you change what npc's say?? because it already says: selling stuff! but i want to change it to: selling range armor!

item.title: Uhm
item.dc:creator: @srfsk8boy srfsk8boy
item.description:
@srfsk8boy wrote:

Go to npc handler and do ctrl + f to find then type in what the npc allready says and then click find then erase what it says and put w/e u want then save exit
compile server and run…

Read full topic

item.title: Uhm
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

Open up NPCHandler.java.

Search for;

if (npcs[i].npcType ==

And add above it;

if (npcs[i].npcType == [ID] { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "[TEXT]"; }

*Change [ID] to the NPC ID and change [TEXT] to what you want it to say.

To change an existing one search for the;

if (npcs[i].npcType == [ID]

*Change [ID] to the NPC’s ID and change the text.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2008, 08:03:32 PM[/size][hr]Hmm already posted. Hope it helps anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Uhm
item.dc:creator: @veki94 veki94
item.description:
@veki94 wrote:

Go in npchandler.java.
Search the ID of the npc,you should see something like this

if (npcs[i].npcType == ID) { if (misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "message !"; } }

Read full topic

find the NPC ID in there and change the text
